hotels.title: Tranquil Northern Ireland Golf Retreat with Onsite Thermal Village & Spa
hotels.description: Soak in pure relaxation at Galgorm resort, a laidback Northern Ireland escape just 30 minutes from Belfast. Find bliss at the Spa at Galgorm and Thermal Village - the first of its kind in Ireland - boasting riverside hot tubs, heated pools, steam rooms and saunas. Then, explore the many nearby golf courses and practice your swing before indulging in a myriad of dining and entertainment spaces, including a rustic Italian restaurant, sophisticated cocktail bar and gin library, and hidden mulberry garden.
